pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行は奈良だったよ。
lessons.english: We went on a school trip to Nara.

lessons.japanese: たいていの学生は修学旅行で京都を見物する。
lessons.english: Most students do the sights of Kyoto on their school excursion.

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行では、よく枕投げをした。
lessons.english: I had a lot of pillow fights during my school trip.

lessons.japanese: 私は修学旅行を大変楽しみにしている。
lessons.english: I am looking forward very much to the school excursion.

lessons.japanese: 私は修学旅行にいくよりもむしろ家にいたいです。
lessons.english: I'd rather stay home than go on the school trip.

lessons.japanese: たいていの学生は修学旅行で京都を見物する。
lessons.english: Most students do the sights of Kyoto on their school excursion.

lessons.japanese: 私は修学旅行を大変楽しみにしている。
lessons.english: I am looking forward very much to the school excursion.

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行では、よく枕投げをした。
lessons.english: I had a lot of pillow fights during my school trip.

lessons.japanese: 私は修学旅行にいくよりもむしろ家にいたいです。
lessons.english: I'd rather stay home than go on the school trip.

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行行ったんだよね？どうだった？
lessons.english: You went on the school trip, didn't you? How was it?

lessons.japanese: 6月の修学旅行で、雨が降らない方がおかしいよね。
lessons.english: It would be strange if it didn't rain on our field trip in June.

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行行ったんだよね？どうだった？
lessons.english: You went on the school trip, didn't you? How was it?

lessons.japanese: 6月の修学旅行で、雨が降らない方がおかしいよね。
lessons.english: It would be strange if it didn't rain on our field trip in June.

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行は奈良だったよ。
lessons.english: We went on a school trip to Nara.

lessons.japanese: 修学旅行は、志賀高原にスキーに行きました。
lessons.english: We went skiing in Shiga Kogen for our school trip.
